name: Online Chess-and-Chat
desc:
online multi-player chess-and-chat game.
 Built using Javascript, HTML/CSS, express.js, SQL, Docker, Redis, SockerIO, JSON Web Token, Google Cloud Storage and MySQL server.

name: Spotify Playlist Quick Maker
desc:
Web app for quickly previewing songs from Spotify library and making playlists from them.
 Built using Javascript, HTML/CSS, ReactJS, and the Spotify API.

name: Roommate Hub
desc:
Web app for managing shared tasks and bills between college roommates who live off-campus. 
 Built using Javascript, HTML/CSS.
